body: I'm annoyed that there is no static or dynamic information telling me whether or not a RegList struct indexes into int_data or bool_data. Can we at least get comments saying which array we're indexing into?
body_html: I'm annoyed that there is no static or dynamic information telling me whether or not a RegList struct indexes into int_data or bool_data. Can we at least get comments saying which array we're indexing into?
